name: Hunting Zombies
description:
A mad scientist created a virus that turns all the humans in to the zombies and now the entire world is in the difficult situation

A few of the humans are still safe from the virus but the zombies are hunting for them to bite them and make 'em Zombies.

- Now you are on a mission to find and kill all of the zombies around the country.

- You will have to go trough different location to save the civilians from Zombies because they are on the hunt for humans and your are on the hunt for Zombies.

- Your task will be to target the zombies and shoot them all but remember as you go further the zombies will get stronger after each level so be prepared.
